name: Project: S.O.U.L.
description:
Project:Soul

Since time has been reverted creatures and monsters are crawling out of their holes to gather "time". "Reset the time clock". Probably the last sentence our heroine Zephia remembers before waking up in front of a clock tower without any clue who she is and why she's even there. At her side is Nova. He's Zephias companion and the key trigger to her abilitys. Together they're trying to find out what happened to the world and to her. 

My dear Kohais!

Everything you see has been created in a time frame of 2 months. I guess you can  imagine what the game will look like in a year! This little pre alpha was requested by my beloved kohais and it gives you guys just a small hint how the gameplay is going to feel. 

Of course, there's still a long bumpy road ahead and we're missing a lot of core systems like inventory, loot,  attributes, skills... and so on. Don't worry, IT WILL BE implemented!

Thank you for believing in us!

The Team

Currently, we're a team of two people - Gamedevelopment, Art & Socialmedia is managed by myself dekisenpaitm. All of the music & sound effects are created and managed by nicosenpaitm.  Nico is one of my best friends and has created music for about 15+ years. I'm very much a beginner and started my gamedev/art journey around April 2022 - you see I'm still learning so please bear this in mind when giving feedback haha..haha....ha *nervous laugther*.

My Goal

I want to create a modern Zelda pixelarty RPG influenced by some Dark Souls aspects with additional features! Here are some special function (not talking about core functions) I'd love to implement:

  • A follower system - follower transforms into different weapons and can change attributes by crafting/looting certain items.
  • Additional weapons which can be summoned and refined~ and by additional I mean a lot! Each with a special skill/movement pattern.
  • Three different meele weapon types - Light, Medium and Heavy.
  • Attribute/Skill upgrade through certain items rather then grinding hours for exp.
  • Different story endings (not gonna spoil too much here, hehe)

and more!

Support us

The first thing each and everyone can do to support us is actually for free! You can follow, like, share and comment our social media profiles and posts - this is already helping a lot!!

If you really want, nobody's forcing you and YOU CAN AFFORD IT! (You & your family should always come first!!) - Feel free to drop a donation - All of your donations are going to be used to cover costs and buy assets and tools for the game!
